dcterms:description: A dataset containing 21,889 fashion outfits collected from the Polyvore website, which includes rich multimodal information such as images, descriptions, likes, and hashtags. The dataset is split into training, validation, and testing sets, and contains a total of 164,379 items.
dcterms:title: Polyvore dataset
